actions.text: Read twice and referred jointly to the Committees on Budget; Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977 with instructions that if one Committee reports, the other Committee has thirty days of continuous session to report or to be discharged.

official_title: A bill to amend the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require the Committees on the Budget to adopt the economic and technical assumptions of the Congressional Budget Office in preparing the concurrent resolution on the budget for a fiscal year.

summary.text: Amends the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require that determinations in preparing the concurrent resolution on the budget be based on the economic and technical assumptions of the Congressional Budget Office.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require the Committees on the Budget to adopt the economic and technical assumptions of the Congressional Budget Office in preparing the concurrent resolution on the budget for a fiscal year.
